item.title: Email for Professionals
item.description: Problem In my professional career, from time to time, I get forwarded an email, out of the blue from a colleague, and this email has a message that reads “Hey Wes, can you do this for me?”. Following this seemingly simple message is a week-long thread of thirty emails between several people and I am the lucky individual who gets added to the chain in hopes that I can resolve the issue.
